item.title: Weekly Summarize 2309 Paper Revise
item.description: Achieved this week: Revised the 2309 LCCA manuscript, responded to most of the comments, and sent Dr. Li the revised manuscript. Most of the comments are constructive. A major revision is conducted on the Abstract and Introduction The most important for academic writing is the logic flow: Locate the gap: The big map, the gap exists when taking a closer look. Support from convincing reports (WHO, World Bank, Government) What did others do?

item.title: Love My Leo
item.description: Thanksgiving Day, Special Love Dear Liu

item.title: Best Thanksgiving Day
item.description: The pandemic caused so many difficulties, and I have been trapped from gathering for a long time. After receiving the vaccine shooting, we are now confident to gather with our friends. It’s very kind of Dr. Li to invite us to his family for Thanksgiving. I prepared a traditional Chinese food called La Rou (Chinese bacon meat), and my roommate Guolong brought a dish called Simmered Pig Feet. Except for us students, Dr.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Peridynamics Simulation This project simulated the low-temperature cracking of SCB specimens. Safety Costs Calculator A spreadsheet was developed to compare the agency, user, and safety costs of different alternatives. More on the way !
